============================================================
llms-full.txt - Component Library Documentation
============================================================

# 1. METADATA | 元数据
# Project identification for LLM context | LLM 快速识别项目信息

PROJECT_NAME: Arco Design React (ArcoUI)
FRAMEWORK: React (version 16+)
LANGUAGE: TypeScript
VERSION: 2.x
LAST_UPDATE: 2026-02-06
RESTRICTION_LEVEL: STRICT  # Enforces strict compliance - no violations allowed

# 2. AI GENERATION CONSTRAINTS | AI 生成强制约束
# HIGHEST PRIORITY RULES | 核心规则，优先级最高

## 2.1 Component Usage Constraints | 组件使用约束

1. **Only use official library components | 仅使用官方组件**
   - Importing and using components from `@arco-design/web-react` is MANDATORY
   - Do NOT create custom implementations using native HTML elements (div, button, input, etc.) if an Arco equivalent exists.
   - Example: Use `<Button>` instead of `<button>`, `<Input>` instead of `<input>`.

2. **Strict import paths | 严格导入路径**
   ```typescript
   import { Button, Space, Card } from '@arco-design/web-react';
   import { IconPlus } from '@arco-design/web-react/icon';
   ```

3. **No style overrides | 禁止样式覆盖**
   - Inheritance, rewriting, or overriding of component built-in styles is FORBIDDEN.
   - Never use `!important` syntax.
   - Do not use `className` to override internal component styles unless absolutely necessary and supported by the API.

## 2.2 Styling Constraints | 样式约束
# Design Tokens Only - Zero Hardcoding | 绑定设计令牌，杜绝硬编码

1. **No inline styles or hardcoded values | 禁止内联样式和硬编码**
   - ❌ Inline `style={{}}` attributes (except for dynamic values not covered by props)
   - ❌ Hardcoded colors (`#165DFF`, `rgb(22, 93, 255)`) - Use tokens!
   - ❌ Hardcoded dimensions (`px` values) for padding/margin - Use `<Space>` or props.

2. **Design token enforcement | 强制使用设计令牌**
   - ✅ Use component props for styling (e.g., `type="primary"`, `size="large"`).
   - ✅ Use the `<Space>` component for layout spacing.
   - ✅ Use CSS variables (e.g., `var(--color-primary-6)`) if custom CSS is unavoidable.

3. **No custom stylesheets | 禁止自定义样式表**
   - Do NOT create independent CSS/SCSS/LESS files to style basic components. Use the component's API.

4. **Built-in responsiveness only | 仅使用内置响应式规则**
   - Use `<Grid.Row>` and `<Grid.Col>` for responsive layouts.

## 2.3 Code Standards Constraints | 代码规范约束

1. **TypeScript strict mode | TypeScript 严格模式**
   - Use TypeScript type definitions.
   - Avoid `any` types.

2. **Stable APIs only | 仅使用稳定版 API**
   - Do not use deprecated props (check official docs if unsure).

3. **Standardized event handlers | 标准化事件处理**
   - Use standard handlers: `onClick`, `onChange`, `onVisibleChange`, etc.

# 3. GLOBAL DESIGN TOKENS | 全局设计令牌
# Single Source of Truth - Unified Style Data Source | 样式唯一数据源

## 3.1 Color System | 颜色系统

Arco Design uses a palette based on 10 grades (1-10). Grade 6 is typically the standard color.

COLOR_VARS: {
  "primary": "var(--color-primary-6)",
  "primary-hover": "var(--color-primary-5)",
  "primary-active": "var(--color-primary-7)",
  "success": "var(--color-success-6)",
  "warning": "var(--color-warning-6)",
  "danger": "var(--color-danger-6)",
  "text-title": "var(--color-text-1)",
  "text-body": "var(--color-text-2)",
  "text-secondary": "var(--color-text-3)",
  "text-disable": "var(--color-text-4)",
  "bg-body": "var(--color-bg-1)",
  "bg-component": "var(--color-bg-2)",
  "bg-popup": "var(--color-bg-5)",
  "border": "var(--color-border-2)"
}

## 3.2 Typography System | 排版系统

TYPOGRAPHY_VARS: {
  "font-family": "Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, PingFang SC, Microsoft YaHei, sans-serif",
  "font-size-body": "14px",
  "line-height-body": "1.5715"
}

## 3.3 Layout & Decoration | 布局与装饰

SPACING_SIZE: {
  "mini": "4px",
  "small": "8px",
  "medium": "16px",
  "large": "24px"
}

# 4. CORE COMPONENT SPECIFICATIONS | 核心组件规范库

## Format | 格式: 
Component Name | Import Path | Core Props | Semantic Nodes | Compliant Example

---
COMPONENT: Button
IMPORT_PATH: import { Button } from '@arco-design/web-react';
CORE_PROPS: {
  "type": "default | primary | secondary | dashed | text | outline",
  "status": "default | warning | success | danger",
  "size": "mini | small | default | large",
  "shape": "square | circle | round",
  "disabled": "boolean",
  "loading": "boolean",
  "icon": "ReactNode",
  "onClick": "(e) => void"
}
USAGE_EXAMPLE:
```tsx
import { Button } from '@arco-design/web-react';
import { IconPlus } from '@arco-design/web-react/icon';

export default function Example() {
  return (
    <Button type="primary" icon={<IconPlus />} onClick={() => console.log('click')}>
      Create Bundle
    </Button>
  );
}
```

---
COMPONENT: Input
IMPORT_PATH: import { Input } from '@arco-design/web-react';
CORE_PROPS: {
  "placeholder": "string",
  "disabled": "boolean",
  "allowClear": "boolean",
  "prefix": "ReactNode",
  "suffix": "ReactNode",
  "addBefore": "ReactNode",
  "addAfter": "ReactNode",
  "size": "mini | small | default | large",
  "maxLength": "number | { length: number, errorOnly: boolean }",
  "showWordLimit": "boolean",
  "onChange": "(value: string, e) => void",
  "onPressEnter": "(e) => void"
}
USAGE_EXAMPLE:
```tsx
import { Input } from '@arco-design/web-react';

export default function Example() {
  return (
    <Input
      style={{ width: 350 }}
      allowClear
      placeholder="Please enter something"
      onChange={(v) => console.log(v)}
    />
  );
}
```

---
COMPONENT: Select
IMPORT_PATH: import { Select } from '@arco-design/web-react';
CORE_PROPS: {
  "placeholder": "string",
  "bordered": "boolean",
  "mode": "multiple",
  "allowClear": "boolean",
  "labelInValue": "boolean",
  "options": "Array<string | number | { label: ReactNode, value: string | number, disabled?: boolean, ... }>",
  "onChange": "(value) => void",
  "style": "CSSProperties"
}
USAGE_EXAMPLE:
```tsx
import { Select } from '@arco-design/web-react';

const options = ['Beijing', 'Shanghai', 'Guangzhou', 'Shenzhen'];

export default function Example() {
  return (
    <Select
      placeholder="Please select"
      style={{ width: 154 }}
      onChange={(value) => console.log(value)}
    >
      {options.map((option) => (
        <Select.Option key={option} value={option}>
          {option}
        </Select.Option>
      ))}
    </Select>
  );
}
```

---
COMPONENT: Card
IMPORT_PATH: import { Card } from '@arco-design/web-react';
CORE_PROPS: {
  "title": "ReactNode",
  "extra": "ReactNode",
  "bordered": "boolean",
  "loading": "boolean",
  "size": "default | small",
  "hoverable": "boolean",
  "actions": "ReactNode[]",
  "cover": "ReactNode"
}
USAGE_EXAMPLE:
```tsx
import { Card, Link } from '@arco-design/web-react';

export default function Example() {
  return (
    <Card
      style={{ width: 360 }}
      title="Arco Card"
      extra={<Link>More</Link>}
    >
      Arco Card Content
    </Card>
  );
}
```

---
COMPONENT: Space
IMPORT_PATH: import { Space } from '@arco-design/web-react';
CORE_PROPS: {
  "align": "start | end | center | baseline",
  "direction": "vertical | horizontal",
  "size": "mini | small | medium | large | number",
  "wrap": "boolean",
  "split": "ReactNode"
}
USAGE_EXAMPLE:
```tsx
import { Space, Button } from '@arco-design/web-react';

export default function Example() {
  return (
    <Space size="large">
      <Button type="primary">Item 1</Button>
      <Button>Item 2</Button>
      <Button>Item 3</Button>
    </Space>
  );
}
```

---
COMPONENT: Table
IMPORT_PATH: import { Table } from '@arco-design/web-react';
CORE_PROPS: {
  "columns": "ColumnProps[]",
  "data": "any[]",
  "loading": "boolean",
  "border": "boolean | { wrapper: boolean, headerCell: boolean, bodyCell: boolean }",
  "pagination": "boolean | PaginationProps",
  "rowKey": "string"
}
USAGE_EXAMPLE:
```tsx
import { Table } from '@arco-design/web-react';

const columns = [
  { title: 'Name', dataIndex: 'name' },
  { title: 'Salary', dataIndex: 'salary' },
  { title: 'Address', dataIndex: 'address' },
  { title: 'Email', dataIndex: 'email' },
];

const data = [{
  key: '1',
  name: 'Jane Doe',
  salary: 23000,
  address: '32 Park Road, London',
  email: 'jane.doe@example.com'
}];

export default function Example() {
  return <Table columns={columns} data={data} />;
}
```

---
COMPONENT: Form
IMPORT_PATH: import { Form, Input, Button } from '@arco-design/web-react';
CORE_PROPS: {
  "form": "FormInstance",
  "layout": "horizontal | vertical | inline",
  "size": "mini | small | default | large",
  "initialValues": "object",
  "onValuesChange": "(value, values) => void",
  "onSubmit": "(values) => void"
}
USAGE_EXAMPLE:
```tsx
import { Form, Input, Button } from '@arco-design/web-react';
const FormItem = Form.Item;

export default function Example() {
  const [form] = Form.useForm();
  return (
    <Form form={form} style={{ width: 600 }} autoComplete="off">
      <FormItem label="Username" field="name" rules={[{ required: true }]}>
        <Input placeholder="please enter your username..." />
      </FormItem>
      <FormItem wrapperCol={{ offset: 5 }}>
        <Button type="primary" htmlType="submit">Submit</Button>
      </FormItem>
    </Form>
  );
}
```

# 5. FORBIDDEN LIST | 禁用清单
# LLM must NEVER use these syntaxes/APIs | LLM 绝对禁止使用的语法/API

FORBIDDEN_LIST: [
  "Use of native HTML elements when Arco components exist (e.g., <button> instead of <Button>)",
  "Inline style={{}} for layout (Use <Space> or <Grid> instead)",
  "Hardcoded colors (e.g., #165DFF) - Use CSS variables",
  "Hardcoded spacing (e.g., margin: '20px') - Use <Space size='large'>",
  "!important in custom CSS",
  "Deprecated props (refer to official docs)"
]

# 6. ENGINEERING VALIDATION RULES | 工程化校验规则
# CI/CD baseline standards - LLM generated code must satisfy these
# CI/CD 兜底标准，LLM 生成代码需满足

LINT_RULES: [
  "ESLint: react/forbid-dom-props (for style)",
  "Ensure all imports are from @arco-design/web-react",
  "Verify no hardcoded hex color codes are used",
  "Ensure accessibility props (alt, aria-labels) are present where needed"
]

# 7. UPDATE LOG | 更新说明
UPDATE_LOG:
- v1.0.0: Initial generation of Arco Design React llms-full.txt
